Blog.post: urlLink I am just trying to tell you guys about my favorite singer and let you all know that her CD has just come out it is "Noise From The Basement" by Skye Sweetnam yeah please if would like to hear some of her songs go to urlLink www.skyesweetnamonline.com/music and listen urlLink Let's all get tangled up in Skye..... please check out all these kewl things about Skye I LOVE MATTHEW

yeah ok so to day is just another day in well uhm boredom but yesterday turned out to be quite the day for me well I posted yesterdays and well Matt read it and well... I understand a lot more now and he was not doubting that it is mutual but he was having trouble accepting the fact... any way yeah today is very boring and my sister is being an annoying brat... well any way yeah I got her to stop because she is a spoiled Brat and I just gave her what she wanted... thats the way to handle it right? any way yeah this is taking me a while to write because I am trying not to look at the key board but I give up... LOVE YA ALL and by the way if you want to know what the Crockett thing is it was a dare from Matt he dared me to put a random last name up so I did

yeah ok so it's not really paradise around here but hey who's judging right? I Y Matthew! Any way yeah so uhm Matthew confuses me because he says he loves me but doubts that it is mutual. He is talking on the phone with me right now and is showing no emotion what so ever yeah he is tired! We are talking about Manga yeah he has never read a manga before! but hey i still love him... yeah i have to get some close on because i might go some where yay he doesn't understand why i like him but i need to go get dressed! Lates
ok today started out boring because matt hasn't called but yeah we are supposed to be going to do some thing in a few so I am really happy because I love him and he is the sweetest guy...

the 8th was the best sorta well me and my boyfriend were on a date and well we were going to the park to play tennis and wel the car broke down we started daitng four days ago and well we have liked each other since the beggining of the school year but we were afraid to tell each other and well now we are in love so well yeah ok
